creditline: Gift of Bill and Roberta Stein
description: image is vertical column of 19 purple and fuchsia cherries with green stems and 2 cherries at L, one purple and one peach color; on dark black background with red/black horizontal stripe in lower half; on cream color paper with deckle edges
markings: BL below image, graphite: 31/35 XVIII; verso BLC, graphite: YHU 070; verso BRC, graphite: 151993-166 / HAM 91-0489
title: Twenty-Two Cherries (XVIII. laughed their cryings and did their dance)
